subtasks: Checking for slug damage on plants

Adding kitchen waste to the worm bin
Preparing for a tour of Jackers Herb Farm
Potting up plants to survive the winter

Applying organic fertilizer to the soil

Loosening roots and re-potting tender plants
Managing water drainage by using a free-draining mix
Pruning water pepper plants to encourage regrowth
Overwintering plants indoors with central heating
Preparing plants for the winter garden
Documenting plant growth and progress
Planning ahead for future garden maintenance

tasks.task: Preparing to Visit Jackers Herb Farm

subtasks: Checking for slug damage and harvesting vegetables
Preparing plants for overwintering (choosing pots, mixing soil, pruning, repotting)
Mixing soil for planting (grit and compost)

Observing the herb farm (but there's not much detail here)

tasks.task: is the main bulk of work. Alternatively, considering the whole transcript as a single day's activity, the main task would be a combination:
Gardening and Plant Care would be the overarching task with subtasks as follows:
Gardening and Plant Care includes checking for pests, harvesting, preparing garden produce, managing compost, and repotting plants. Then separate task for seasonal preparation.
